tool_description: Tracks product inventory levels, monitors stock movements, and provides availability status with automated reorder point calculations.

product_sku.description: Product SKU or identifier to track

error_messages: Invalid SKU format: Provide a non-empty product SKU string
Negative stock values: current_stock and reserved_stock must be non-negative integers
Invalid lead time: lead_time_days must be a positive integer
Reserved stock exceeds available: reserved_stock cannot exceed current_stock
usage: Provide product_sku and current_stock as required parameters; optionally specify reserved_stock, reorder_point, and lead_time_days for comprehensive inventory tracking.

available_stock.description: Stock available for sale (current minus reserved)

stock_status.description: Inventory status: in_stock, low_stock, out_of_stock, or discontinued

reorder_needed.description: Whether inventory has reached reorder point

days_of_inventory.description: Estimated days until stock depletion based on current sales velocity
